data.name: GAME QUOTES - THE GAME
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord Server!

https://discord.gg/X22H7ue


About the Game



We are just two friendly apes who learned how to make games in our free time and now love to bring our often crazy ideas to live in all kinds of games. Please expect our games to be smaller, raw experiences. We always love to chat with you guys and greatly appreciate all of your feedback in order to become better game creators.
Just tell us your questions or ideas on the forums, Twitter or Facebook. If you encounter bugs or any problems, we will do all we can to ensure the best support that a drunken ape could possibly give.



Take a quiz to test your knowledge about your most favorite games - and learn more interesting quotes from the best games out there on the way. With a bit of intuition and some game experience, you can answer our way up to the top of the quiz and earn 1.000.000 points. But it doesn‚Äôt stop there, shoot us a message on discord or via the community hub and have your favorite game quote included in the game!



üî∏Answer 12 questions in a row to become the game quotes master
üî∏Use 3 cool jokers to help out with the most difficult questions
üî∏Find your favorite games and quotes within the game
üî∏Submit your own favorite quote and it will be included in the game (via the steam community page or via our discord)
üî∏Countless quotes with new content being added over time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything should work.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Who needs that?
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 1000
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Better harder faster stronger.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: You need it!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: i3 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any is fine.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, there is background music.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS XXX
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: No boobs included, so the graphic doesn't matter too much.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Oh, and also sound effect that you might want to hear.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
